Merge pull request #8 from TeamW-P/routing

Focuses on separating processing into a separate helper class chefs_assistant. It allows routes.py to focus purely on initial routing rather than doing any heavy lifting.

Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/TeamW-P/RNABayesPairing2 into routing

clean-up bayespairing

- separates a lot of processing into a separate helper class

Merge pull request #7 from TeamW-P/experimental

- Standard calls to BayesPairing including string & file support.
- Implements a new class, pipeline_bp, in-order to have BayesPairing return output directly instead of saving it to a file. Inputs are stored locally through the use of Python's tempfile module which allows safe unique temporary storage and permanent destruction once complete.
- Implements pipeline_chefschoice which generates an SVG for output.
- Both string and file input are handled via a POST and as a result, data is provided via the request body. String input is handled via POST for the sake of consistency.
- Implements representative graph generation which takes a module or a list of modules. Searches the default dataset. Data produced by this method represents what is passed to VeRNAl/RNAMigos. A parameter "get_graphs" is used to indicate whether this should be run within BayesPairing calls. The frontend team will also call this endpoint through the pipeline.
- Switches to the new version of BayesPairing

A parameter "get_graphs" is used to indicate whether this should be run within BayesPairing calls. The frontend team will also call this endpoint through the pipeline.

switch to new version of BP, complete output, general cleanup

- switches to the new version of BayesPairing
- implements complete output
- implements a new class, pipeline_chefschoice to produce an svg
in the context of the pipeline

dictionary

Merge pull request #3 from TeamW-P/experimental

Refactor BayesPairing + routing tweaks

switch string input to a POST

- switches string input to a post to be consistent with file input
but also because we need to eventually add support for dataset
uploading (see issue #5)

switch to tempfile, remove counter

- switches to tempfile instead of using a counter which allows
for safer handling of input files without permanently saving them
- removes delta argument as it is not needed for BP (confirmed with Roman)
- switches bayespairing file endpoint to be a single POST rather
than having a POST for file upload and a GET for an actual request

remove output files, fix representative graph data

- removes the need to create output files and instead directly
returns the output. A new class (pipeline_bp) is made to handle this.
- fixes a bug in representative graph generation where node data was
missing
- removes the exit handling from the counter. this solution overall
probably needs re-evaluation
Merge branch 'routing' of https://github.com/TeamW-P/RNABayesPairing2 into routing

routing: add file input support, graph representation retrieval

- adds support for file inputs
- adds an endpoint for getting representative graphs based on module ID
- adds counter in-order to generate a unique file name for inputs
(expect this to be changed)
- note: this is more of a framework update, things still require further
rework

switch from boolean to int for endpoint params

- Prevents having to compare to a string boolean i.e., "True" or "False"
which is the case when data is passed through the pipeline instead
of calling the endpoint directly.

routing: add all optional parameters

- Allows the user to set any of the optional parameters.
- Lacks robust error handling.
naming: switch to caps for directory constant
add missing output directory creation
refactor: update display_modules with relative paths

switch from boolean to int for endpoint params

- Prevents having to compare to a string boolean i.e., "True" or "False"
which is the case when data is passed through the pipeline instead
of calling the endpoint directly.

routing: add all optional parameters

- Allows the user to set any of the optional parameters.
- Lacks robust error handling.
Update README.md

refactor BayesPairing + routing tweaks

- BayesPairing currently operates through absolute paths in-terms of
imports and file references. This means it was designed to be
run within the source folder which is incompatible with our
architecture. This commit refactors BayesPairing in-order to take
advantage of relative paths. This includes not only imports,
but instances where files are loaded.
- This also includes some tweaks to top-level routing to set-up
a basic example of a callable endpoint. This is functional.
